verses.name: Matthew 5:41
verses.text: And whosoever shall compel thee to go a mile, go with him twain.

verses.name: Matthew 5:42
verses.text: Give to him that asketh thee, and from him that would borrow of thee turn not thou away.

verses.name: Matthew 5:43
verses.text: Ye have heard that it hath been said, Thou shalt love thy neighbour, and hate thine enemy.

verses.name: Matthew 5:44
verses.text: But I say unto you, Love your enemies, bless them that curse you, do good to them that hate you, and pray for them which despitefully use you, and persecute you;
